response.original_title: Until Dawn Como Você Nunca Viu
response.overview: In this independent (and unofficial) documentary from the Ala Secreta channel, Aline Lauxen breaks down every detail surrounding the game Until Dawn, released in 2015, and its little-known past — including two completely scrapped earlier versions made for the PS3, cast changes, and story alterations. Created by a single person and totaling over seventy hours of production, Until Dawn Como Você Nunca Viu is exactly what Brazilian fans of the game needed: a comprehensive piece covering everything about this iconic title in the horror genre.
response.title: Until Dawn Como Você Nunca Viu
